name: Devils On Our Street
description:
Devils On Our Street

Game by Jack Bennett and Joshua Taylor

If you happen upon any bugs or glitches feel free to email us at core7797@yahoo.com

Devils on our street has been in the ideas for over 5 years, and finally development on the game has taken near 3-4 weeks. The game is still not fully completed, updates may be released to fix bugs and add quality of life to the game to give our players the best experience of the game world we have built. 

In the game there are Trophies for you to earn after completing achievements, currently there is only 1 in game but more are on their way. The current Trophy can be earned by defeating the Monster in his 2nd phase therefore completing the main game story.

Devils on our street is a horror survival game, The player must attempt to destroy the monster before they are killed, explore around the island to find items and other more sinister things, maybe even stumble upon the cave of the beast itself.

DLC is currently in the works for those players who enjoy the feel and design of the game this DLC will include; map changes, new enemies, new environments, new items, new rewards, new trophies and a brand new adventure for our players.

  • Monster 2nd Phase
  • Settings Menu
  • DLC
  • Health Pickups
  • Wider range of diggable items
  • More areas for looting
  • Monster speed increase
  • Difficulty meter
  • Speed run compatibility
  • More Trophies
  • Droppable Items
  • Pause Menu
  • Crouching
  • Item Pickup Fix
